news.title: New API++ front-end and back-end!
news.author: Piccolowen
news.content: I decided to re-write pretty much all of the Electron app for API++. I attempted to use React and Material UI but it didn't work out.

news.title: Welcome to the API++ News Widget!
news.author: Piccolowen
news.content: Congrats, you are seeing some news!
